remarks: Set of arrows of the category of rings (in a universe).  (Contributed by AV, 14-Feb-2020.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ringcbasOLD.c $e |- C = ( RingCatOLD ` U ) $.
ringcbasOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
ringcbasOLD.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
ringchomfvalOLD.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
ringchomfvalOLD $p |- ( ph -> H = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( x RingHom y ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d U x y $.
$d ph x y $.
$d x y $.
